attributes.action: Force the bus companies in the West Midlands to run services better and on time instead of extreamly late
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The bus companies in the West Midlands always operate their services late or not at all.

It is time that they are forced to run on time instead of lateness and if they are late to be fined, or named and shamed.
